name: Short Term Memory Loss
description:
In this game, you play as Stanley, and you wake up in an unfamiliar complex. In order to progress, you'll need to manage what you can remember - 7 objects at a time. Once you encounter your eighth object, you may notice that first object you saw fade from memory.

Pass the tests, or escape to freedom? Good luck, Stanley.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Hold Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look

Your comments are much appreciated! Please let me know what you think of the game, and I look forward to making more games for jams in the future!

This game was made for MindJam 2016 (which totally should have been called Mind Games, but you know, I'm just the developer).
